title: ‘I Feel Good’: Sepp Kuss Revving Toward Vuelta a España Defense, Wout van Aert Confirmed For 2024 Debut
content:
Kuss and Van Aert confirmed as leaders for Vuelta a España in crucial 'last chance saloon' on 2024 for both riders and the Visma-Lease a Bike team.

Read the full article at ‘I Feel Good’: Sepp Kuss Revving Toward Vuelta a España Defense, Wout van Aert Confirmed For 2024 Debut on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
